name: AVR_CONDOMINIUM
description:
Loading takes 10secs - 1min. If takes too long to load, press right click and reload.

Once loaded, click anywhere in a model and follow below keyboard keys:

W            MOVE FRONT
A             MOVE LEFT
D             MOVE RIGHT
S              MOVE BACK
Ctrl      CRAWL

F            CHANGE  FLOOR MATERIALS

G         CHANGE  WALL MATERIALS
